member.name: M:EdSnider.Plugins.NotifierService.Show(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Show a local toast notification. Notification will also appear in the Notification Center on Windows Phone 8.1.
member.param: Body or description of the notification

member.name: P:EdSnider.Plugins.Notifier.Current
member.summary: Gets the current platform specific INotifierService implementation.
